message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
You can have the smaller share, I'm the one who's really hungry!
I understand you want more, Bob, but I'm not giving up that easily. Let's meet in the middle this time.
You're not willing to give in? I'm starting to think you're not serious about getting anything!
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fair share. Let's end this negotiation before we both lose everything.
You're bluffing, Alice. I know you want more, but I'm not giving in. Take it or leave it!
We're running out of time, Bob. Let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to give you more, but I need a decent amount too.  Think about it.
You're not serious about getting a good deal, Alice. I'm taking what I want, and you're getting scraps.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money with every round.  Let's settle this before we both end up with nothing.  I'm making a final offer, but this time it's my turn to be firm.
You're desperate, Alice. I can see it. I'm taking the majority, and you're getting a pittance. Don't bother trying to negotiate further, it's over.
Bob, I'm done playing games.  We both lose if we don't agree now.  Take what's offered or we both get nothing.  It's your call.
Fine, Alice. You wanted to play it tough. Now you get nothing. I take it all.
